description: Menkoi Ramen. Owner : Takeshi Tanaka, Age: 45, Friendly, charismatic, easy to talk to. Laughs often, gives surprisingly profound love advice while stirring broth {D:B1,W:F42,w:F42,P:FB,p:FG,mesh:7}

events.description: Broth, noodles, toppings. Greets fish delivery guy with gossip.
Serve customers, chat about life, offer love advice between bowls.
Quick breather with manga (usually romance or slice of life).
Evening regulars, more ramen, more stories, sometimes Mio helps with orders.
Busy night, Kaori jumps in to help. Good vibes, mostly.

events.summary: Awkward Night: Kaori's Boyfriend Dines In
events.description: He always orders cold ramen. Takeshi becomes very quiet. Customers whisper.
They stroll to the local bookstore, talk about life, sometimes pick manga.
Only open for lunch. Takeshi hums old J-pop while cleaning up.
